channel.title: Others can't log on server?
channel.description: Ok i have reapagescape source i portforwarded with my ip address and i used uttorent i download no-ip i set my firewall settings but others can't log on i tried everything but thing is i had it running perfectly fine yesterday night. i left it run all night while i was downloading .net framework and i tried it in the morning and now it don't work!? wut i do wrong!? :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2009, 08:09:15 pm[/size][hr]help!! please any conclusions?

item.title: Others can't log on server?
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

I had a similar problem, this may sound a little weird but i had my server set on an ip address, which was actually my own ip address, and then the next day it allowed connections through a totally different ip, and my original, try connecting through your local host, and some servers tell you in the batch file what the ip is that your connecting to your server. Just look in there once your logged in to your server, and then change your ip your connecting too, to that, and it may or may not work, it all depends.

Read full topic

item.title: Others can't log on server?
item.dc:creator: @XXwolfXX XXwolfXX
item.description:
@XXwolfXX wrote:

Ok i have reapagescape source i portforwarded with my ip address and i used uttorent i download no-ip i set my firewall settings but others can’t log on i tried everything but thing is i had it running perfectly fine yesterday night. i left it run all night while i was downloading .net framework and i tried it in the morning and now it don’t work!? wut i do wrong!? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2009, 08:09:15 pm[/size][hr]help!! please any conclusions?
